2 sticks (8 ounces) unsalted butter, plus more for greasing
1 small clove garlic, grated or very finely chopped
2-3 tablespoons clarified butter or vegetable oil
1 head green leaf lettuce, sliced or shredded thin
1 Gala apple, cut into small dice
1 pound fingerling potatoes, tossed in vegetable oil
2 cans black beans, drained, rinsed and drained again
1 pound ripe tomatoes, seeded and chopped (about 2 cups)
1 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more as needed
4 (6-ounce) fillets of Lemonfish or Ling (or any other type of slightly firm white fish)
6 shallots, 1 cup diced, 3 left whole and peeled
